Posts.Content: Sep 6, 2014 02:53PM Lorlyn wrote: Hi Catesmom I too also have fluid on my right lung only. Had shortness of breath just walking around. Had to have my lung drained about every six days. I finally had the doctor put in a drain where I do it myself at home. Best thing I ever did. I drain daily. It sure helps me a lot! Best of luck to you!
